title: LF Jungler [D4+]
body:
I am looking for a Diamond 4+ Jungler that is looking to compete in the competitive side of League of Legends. Lower ranks will be looked at if you were Diamond 4+ last season.


* Must have a champ pool of at least 3. You will be pushed to learn more but to start with 3 is a requirement.

* You must have a microphone / headset, use discord, able to communicate in English

* Willing to improve as a player & team.

* Able to actively communicate with the coaching staff & express opinions maturely.

* Attend scrims & VOD Reviews

**Add ReformedUser in-game to discuss further as I will most likely not be monitoring this thread actively**
